text: Jibla (Kuwaiti Arabic: جِبْلَة Jibla, from Arabic قِبْلَة Qibla) is a historic area of Kuwait City. It is one of Kuwait's oldest neighbourhoods, although most pre-oil buildings were demolished. The area, along with Sharq, Mirgab, and Dasman form the bulk of modern-day Kuwait City. ==References== Category:Kuwait City
title: Jibla, Kuwait
